relevant_findings.general: Well appearing, winces with movement of his lower extremities, tremor is noticeable, easily navigates his folder of paperwork.
relevant_findings.HEENT: NC/AT, EOMI, sclerae anicteric, MMM, sub-lingual jaundice.
relevant_findings.lungs: CTA bilat, no r/rh/wh, good air movement, resp unlabored, no accessory muscle use.
relevant_findings.heart: Tachycardia, RRR, no MRG, nl S1-S2.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Normal bowel sounds, soft, non-tender, non-distended, no rebound or guarding, no masses.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, 2+ pulses radial and dp.
relevant_findings.neuro: Awake, A&Ox3, CNs II-XII grossly intact, muscle strength ___ throughout, sensation grossly intact throughout. Tremor.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Prior to transfer, vitals showed an increase in heart rate and a decrease in blood pressure.
